name: Russian Salad
description: Boiled potato, 2 carrot, piquillo pepper, peas, pickles, green olives, tuna/bonito, shrimp, 2 boiled egg.

name: Asparagus and ham puff pastries
description: Sheet puff pastry, 2 asparagus, 1 slice serrano jam, 1 slice edam cheese, sesame.

name: Galician-style octopus
description: Sliced octopus leg, sliced boiled potato, salt flakes, olive oil, red pepper.
